column1: Table S2: Macroevolutionary correlates of interspecific variation in tail length. Shown are the results of a Bayesian phylogenetic linear regression, computed in MCMCglmm. Statistically significant coefficients are highlighted in grey. Note that there are no arboreal Castorimorphs or fossorial Anomaluromorphs.
With litter size as a fixed effect.
Without litter size as a fixed effect.
